message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $10,000. Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our values, considering the product's worth $10,000 to me and $15,000 to you.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer.  While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $12,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference between our last offers? I'm willing to come down to $15,000. That's still a great deal for you, considering your value for the product.

I understand your position, but $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $13,500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and your initial offer.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence in negotiating.  I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time. How about $14,250? This is a fair compromise, and it gets us closer to a deal. Let's close this transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,750, but that's as high as I can go. I hope we can meet in the middle one more time.
